articles.title: LG unveils smart hospitality solutions
articles.author: Arinze Nwafor
articles.summary: LG Electronics has introduced a range of smart life solutions tailored for the growing hospitality sector in Nigeria. The unveiling took place at the 2025 Hotel, Restaurant, and Café Industries Exhibition in Lagos. LG made its debut as an exhibitor at the event. LG's participation in HORECA 2025 reinforces its commitment to delivering tailored, high-efficiency total space solutions for Nigeria's residential and commercial markets.

articles.title: Everything we know about the Samsung Galaxy A56, A36 and A26
articles.author: Tahnee-Jae Lopez-Vito
articles.summary: There are three new contenders for the best budget phones, all hailing from Samsung's latest Galaxy A series. The new lineup starts from just $499, leaving a noticeably smaller gap between the old and the new. The differences between the new and the old models can be seen in the difference between the amount of glass and the number of features.

articles.title: Chipotle announces new item as limited-time offering across North America and Europe; check what the special dish is
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Chipotle announced the temporary addition of Chipotle Honey Chicken to the menu in its restaurants across North America and Europe. The protein option was first introduced by the chain at locations in Nashville and Sacramento last year on an experimental basis. It emerged as the brand's best-selling limited-time offering after the launch. It will be available for a limited time at all Chipotle restaurants across the US, Canada and the UK beginning Friday (March 7) and in France and Germany on Wednesday (March 12).

articles.title: Your Reddit posts will now be less likely to break the rules
articles.author: Ben Lovejoy
articles.summary: Reddit is starting to test a new AI check feature in the iOS and Android apps. It allows you to ask an AI to check your post before you submit it. The feature will be available to a small number of users first. It will save time and reduce the need to check a post.

articles.title: Is RBI's CBDC initiative just another digital mirage?

articles.summary: CBDC was supposed to be launched in late 2022. Commercial banks that made CBDC available through their apps hailed it as 'a revolutionary step towards digitalising India's economy'. Tech mavens, including the founding father of Aadhaar, stated that CBDC will have more value and be more effective on the cross-border side. CBDC was meant to curtail India's dependence on the dollar, elevating the rupee's standing in the world currency basket and manage monetary policy objectives.

It has invited bids to engage a Project Management Unit (PMU) for property development along the Delhi-Ghaziabad-Namo Bharat corridor. The identified land parcels for development include large plots in Ghaziabad, Duhai Depot, Bhaisali Depot, and Modipuram Depot.

articles.title: Is Zinc Additive Really Needed For Older Engines?
articles.summary: In the past, motor oils had all the vitamins and minerals that old engines needed. Today's motor oils are optimized for new engines stuffed with bleeding edge technologies and tolerances measured in Plancks. Modern oils are better at keeping your engine safe and running at peak performance than the dinosaur squeezins your granddad used. The one area where today's engine oils might be lacking is when it comes to the amount of zinc in the oil. If you have an older engine with a flat tappet cam in it, you should be using a zinc additive.

articles.author: Cecily Mauran
articles.summary: Sesame launched a demo for its Conversational Speech Model (CSM) on Feb. 27. CSM aims to create more meaningful interactions with AI chatbots. Sesame's voice assistant is available as a free demo on the site and comes in two voices: Maya and Miles.

articles.title: BYD's new roof-mounted DJI drone launchpad looks like a dream for filming road trips – but less so for car safety
articles.author: Leon Poultney
articles.summary: The Ling Yuan drone system is priced at 16,000 yuan or around $2,195. It is only available in mainland China for now, but will be available on many BYD models. It consists of a bespoke 'hangar' system housed on the roof, which folds open to reveal a built-in DJI drone. It also has an automated system that both charges and swaps out depleted battery packs.

articles.author: Davey Winder
articles.summary: AI-powered scam protection for Android has just rolled out. It is enabled by default for messages on Android phones. Google claims it protects users from phishing attacks that exploit social engineering tricks. Google Message AI protection is launching for English speakers in the U.S., U.K. and Canada, with other countries to follow soon. Call protection will be available to all English-speaking Pixel 9+ users in the United States.

articles.summary: This is TotalEnergies' ongoing expansion to offer car servicing options beyond the traditional lube bays at their service stations.
